attributes.action: Investigate the wasted money for the Garden Bridge when Boris Johnson was mayor.
attributes.background: The public deserve to know where the £46.4m of tax payers money was wasted. We as the public find this a vast sum to be wasted and would like an investigation to see where all of the money went. In times of austerity this money could of been put to better use.

rejection.details:
There's already been an independent inquiry into the Garden Bridge project, so we're not sure what further action you'd like to see.

You can find out more here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/independent-review-garden-bridge-project
